document.full_text: a lawsuit was filed on friday over gov. paul lepage's decision to remove a mural depicting the state's labor history from the labor department's building in augusta.
document.title: new england: maine: lawsuit seeks to restore labor mural
lines_and_colors: a lawsuit was filed on friday over gov. paul lepage's decision to remove a mural depicting the state's labor history from the labor department's building in augusta.
